price: Dhugumatti Luqmaaniif ogummaa kenninee jirra.“Rabbiif galata galchi. Namni (Rabbiin) galateeffate kan inni galateeffatu matuma isaatiifi; Namni kafares (matuma isaa irratti) Rabbiin dureessa, faarfamaadha” (jechuun).
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَا لُقۡمَٰنَ ٱلۡحِكۡمَةَ أَنِ ٱشۡكُرۡ لِلَّهِۚ وَمَن يَشۡكُرۡ فَإِنَّمَا يَشۡكُرُ لِنَفۡسِهِۦۖ وَمَن كَفَرَ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَنِيٌّ حَمِيدٞ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ātaynā luq'māna al-ḥik'mata ani ush'kur lillahi waman yashkur fa-innamā yashkuru linafsihi waman kafara fa-inna al-laha ghaniyyun ḥamīdun
